pageContent.title: Well Done
pageContent.descriptionText:
Well Done"You are doing great. This is the best question to ask at this point.

This Results question probes Dr. Cardonza’s answer to the previous question while staying focused on results. To the extent that you are able to clearly define the department’s patient treatment goals and the strategies for achieving those goals, you will have a stronger grasp on how to advance the prescribing cycle. This Results question also shows that you were listening to Dr. Cardonza and heard a strategic direction he is focusing on."
